Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Upādinnattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
27.
2515Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha…pe…  napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke cha, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte tīṇi…pe…  novigate cha.
2516(Yathā kusalattike anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā, evaṃ gaṇetabbā.)
2517Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
